item.title: TryHackMe Baron Samedit
item.description: OverView Baron Samedit room Baron Samedit Task 01: Deploy Task 02: Baron Samedit In January 2021, Qualys released a blog post detailing a terrifying new vulnerability in the Unix sudo program. Specifically, this was a heap buffer overflow allowing any user to escalate privileges to root – no misconfigurations required. This exploit works with the default settings, for any user regardless of sudo permissions, which makes it all the scarier. The vulnerability has been patched, but affects any unpatched version of the sudo program from 1.
